title: Live updates: U.S. and Israel launch attack on Iran as Trump calls for regime change
summary_full: The U.S. launched “major combat operations in Iran,” President Donald Trump said, promising to destroy its missiles and give rise to a change in government.
summary_public: The U.S. launched “major combat operations in Iran,” President Donald Trump said, promising to destroy its missiles and give rise to a change in government.

IR.label: negative
IR.evidence: U.S. and Israel launch attack on Iran
